meanings.definition: A bag used to carry books and other supplies to school.
meanings.sent1: My schoolbags are heavy with all my textbooks.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to pack your lunch in your schoolbags.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally packed my cat in my schoolbags instead of my lunch!
meanings.sent4: Her schoolbags were like a treasure chest filled with knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The colorful schoolbags hung on the hooks, ready for the day ahead.

meanings.definition: To pack or organize items in a schoolbag.
meanings.sent1: I need to schoolbags my pencils and erasers for tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She carefully schoolbags her notebooks before heading to class.
meanings.sent3: He tried to schoolbags his toys in the tiny schoolbag, but they wouldn't fit.
meanings.sent4: The way she schoolbags her belongings shows her organizational skills.
meanings.sent5: Remember to schoolbags your gym clothes for PE class.
